summary: Adds a standalone female vampire follower Karlina
descriptionHtml:
[center]Sorry, English is not my native Language. So I don't understand well the meaning of comments. :'(

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/63706-1-1426249679.jpg[/img]

Feature:
-Adds a female vampire follower. Her name is Karlina.
-This is a Standalone mod. But this needs Dawnguard DLC.

Follower Info:
-Name : Karlina
-Sex : Female
-Body : CBBE (I don't have a plan to upload the UNP version)
-CombatStyle : Flame Magician
-Location: 'Windpeak Inn' in Dawnstar
-Perk:
Light Foot, Silence, Twin Souls, MagicResistance, Augmented Flames, Necromancy
Destruction Novice, Destruction Apprentice, Destruction Adept, Destruction Dual Casting
-Essential, Marriage possible

[youtube]fXjBMCUk9zE[/youtube]
-Video by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1054929]Supertin[/url]. Thank you! :D

Recommended mod:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Face Light[/url] by tktk1
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303]Female Facial Animation[/url] by nao4288

Credits:

KS Hairdos - 265 by Kalilies
Female face mod by Gonzo
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59192]Eyes of Aber[/url] (My mod)
Thanks everyone!! :D

History Log:
2015.03.13 v1.0 Released
2015.03.14 v1.1 Changes a little bit (walking speed, AI package, appearance...)
